original_text: While I was thinking about this, I saw a male goat that was coming from the west. It ran quickly across the earth. Its feet did not even touch the ground. The goat had a large horn between its eyes.
korean_text: 내가 생각할 때에 한 숫염소가 서쪽에서부터 와서 온 지면에 두루 다니되 땅에 닿지 아니하며 그 염소의 두 눈 사이에는 현저한 뿔이 있더라

sentences.original_text: While I was thinking about this
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이것에 대해 생각하고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: that was coming from the west
It ran quickly across the earth
Its feet did not even touch the ground
The goat had a large horn
sentences.korean_translation: 그 염소는 큰 뿔을 가지고 있었습니다
